name: Mech n' Parcel
summary:
Made for the Retrograde 2020 jam! 
 
Our theme was to simply make a retro game, from around the NES era. Of the 10 days we had, according to my timer this took me almost 9 of them! 
 
Mech n' Parcel is a game about a world where even after the apocalypse, people still need to get their mail. Of course the outside world is dangerous, so the delivery drivers are mech pilots. What else would they do? 
 
You get given a life-changing job, but the route you'll have to take will be a lot more dangerous than your normal routes. Cut through Pyro's, Green Thumb's , and Flywheel's territory to get your package to the recipient!
